TABLE_DEFINITIONS.Name: State annual disposable personal income summary: disposable personal income, population, and per capita disposable personal income

LINE.Definition: The income available to persons for spending or saving. It is equal to personal income less personal current taxes.
The number of individuals (both civilian and military) who reside in a given area.
Disposable personal income of a given area divided by the resident population of the area. See "disposable personal income."
